   21: %% File    : xmerl_sax_stream_SUITE.erl
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: -module(xmerl_sax_stream_SUITE).
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: 
   26: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Include files
   28: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %%======================================================================
   33: %% External functions
   34: %%======================================================================
   35: 
   36: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: %% Initializations
   38: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: all() ->
   40:     [
   41:      one_document,
   42:      two_documents,
   43:      one_document_and_junk,
   44:      end_of_stream
   45:     ].
   46: 
   47: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% Initializations
   49: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: 
   51: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% Tests
   65: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: 
   67: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: %% Send One doc over stream
   69: one_document(Config) ->
   70:     Port = 11111,
   71: 
   72:     {ok, ListenSocket} = listen(Port),
   73:     Self = self(),
   74:     
   75:     spawn(
   76:       fun() ->
   77:               case catch gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
   78:                   {ok, S} ->
   79:                       Result = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(<<>>, 
   80:                                                       [{continuation_state, S},
   81:                                                        {continuation_fun, 
   82:                                                         fun(Sd) ->
   83:                                                                 io:format("Continuation called!!", []),
   84:                                                                 case gen_tcp:recv(Sd, 0) of
   85:                                                                     {ok, Packet} ->
   86:                                                                         io:format("Packet: ~p\n", [Packet]),
   87:                                                                         {Packet, Sd};
   88:                                                                     {error, Reason} ->
   89:                                                                         throw({error, Reason})
   90:                                                                 end
   91:                                                         end}]),
   92:                       Self ! {xmerl_sax, Result},
   93:                       close(S);
   94:                    Error ->
   95:                       Self ! {xmerl_sax, {error, {accept, Error}}}
   96:               end
   97:       end),
   98: 
   99:     {ok, SendSocket} = connect(localhost, Port),
  100:    
  101:     {ok, Binary} = file:read_file(filename:join([datadir(Config), "xmerl_sax_stream_one.xml"])),
  102:     
  103:     send_chunks(SendSocket, Binary),
  104: 
  105:     receive
  106:         {xmerl_sax, {ok, undefined, Rest}} ->
  107:             <<"\n">> = Rest,
  108:             io:format("Ok Rest: ~p\n", [Rest])        
  109:        after 5000 ->
  110:                ct:fail("Timeout")
  111:     end,
  112:     ok.
  113:     
  114: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: %% Send Two doc over stream
  116: two_documents(Config) ->
  117:     Port = 11111,
  118: 
  119:     {ok, ListenSocket} = listen(Port),
  120:     Self = self(),
  121:     
  122:     spawn(
  123:       fun() ->
  124:               case catch gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
  125:                   {ok, S} ->
  126:                       Result = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(<<>>, 
  127:                                                       [{continuation_state, S},
  128:                                                        {continuation_fun, 
  129:                                                         fun(Sd) ->
  130:                                                                 io:format("Continuation called!!", []),
  131:                                                                 case gen_tcp:recv(Sd, 0) of
  132:                                                                     {ok, Packet} ->
  133:                                                                         io:format("Packet: ~p\n", [Packet]),
  134:                                                                         {Packet, Sd};
  135:                                                                     {error, Reason} ->
  136:                                                                         throw({error, Reason})
  137:                                                                 end
  138:                                                         end}]),
  139:                       Self ! {xmerl_sax, Result},
  140:                       close(S);
  141:                    Error ->
  142:                       Self ! {xmerl_sax, {error, {accept, Error}}}
  143:               end
  144:       end),
  145: 
  146:     {ok, SendSocket} = connect(localhost, Port),
  147:    
  148:     {ok, Binary} = file:read_file(filename:join([datadir(Config), "xmerl_sax_stream_two.xml"])),
  149:     
  150:     send_chunks(SendSocket, Binary),
  151: 
  152:     receive
  153:         {xmerl_sax, {ok, undefined, Rest}} ->
  154:             <<"\n<?x", _R/binary>> = Rest,
  155:             io:format("Ok Rest: ~p\n", [Rest])        
  156:        after 5000 ->
  157:                ct:fail("Timeout")
  158:     end,
  159:     ok.
  160:     
  161: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  162: %% Send one doc and then junk on stream
  163: one_document_and_junk(Config) ->
  164:     Port = 11111,
  165: 
  166:     {ok, ListenSocket} = listen(Port),
  167:     Self = self(),
  168:     
  169:     spawn(
  170:       fun() ->
  171:               case catch gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
  172:                   {ok, S} ->
  173:                       Result = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(<<>>, 
  174:                                                       [{continuation_state, S},
  175:                                                        {continuation_fun, 
  176:                                                         fun(Sd) ->
  177:                                                                 io:format("Continuation called!!", []),
  178:                                                                 case gen_tcp:recv(Sd, 0) of
  179:                                                                     {ok, Packet} ->
  180:                                                                         io:format("Packet: ~p\n", [Packet]),
  181:                                                                         {Packet, Sd};
  182:                                                                     {error, Reason} ->
  183:                                                                         throw({error, Reason})
  184:                                                                 end
  185:                                                         end}]),
  186:                       Self ! {xmerl_sax, Result},
  187:                       close(S);
  188:                    Error ->
  189:                       Self ! {xmerl_sax, {error, {accept, Error}}}
  190:               end
  191:       end),
  192: 
  193:     {ok, SendSocket} = connect(localhost, Port),
  194:    
  195:     {ok, Binary} = file:read_file(filename:join([datadir(Config), "xmerl_sax_stream_one_junk.xml"])),
  196:     
  197:     send_chunks(SendSocket, Binary),
  198: 
  199:     receive
  200:         {xmerl_sax, {ok, undefined, Rest}} ->
  201:             <<"\nth", _R/binary>> = Rest,
  202:             io:format("Ok Rest: ~p\n", [Rest])        
  203:        after 10000 ->
  204:                ct:fail("Timeout")
  205:     end,
  206:     ok.
  207: 
  208: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  209: %% Test of continuation when end of stream
  210: end_of_stream(_Config) ->
  211:     Stream = <<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?><a>hej</a>">>,
  212:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(Stream, []),
  213:     ok.
  214:     
  215: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  216: %% Utility functions
  217: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  218: listen(Port) ->
  219:     case catch gen_tcp:listen(Port, [{active, false}, 
  220: 				     binary, 
  221: 				     {keepalive, true},
  222: 				     {reuseaddr,true}]) of
  223: 	{ok, ListenSocket} ->
  224:             {ok, ListenSocket};
  225: 	{error, Reason} ->
  226: 	    {error, {listen, Reason}}
  227:     end.
  228: 
  229: close(Socket) ->
  230:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Socket)).
  231: 
  232: connect(Host, Port) ->
  233:      Timeout = 5000,
  234:      % Options1 = check_options(Options),
  235:      Options = [binary],
  236:      case catch gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, Options, Timeout) of
  237:  	{ok, Socket} ->
  238:  	    {ok, Socket};
  239:  	{error, Reason} ->
  240: 	    {error, Reason}
  241:      end.
  242: 
  243: send_chunks(Socket, Binary) ->
  244:     BSize = erlang:size(Binary),
  245:     if 
  246:         BSize > 25 ->
  247:             <<Head:25/binary, Tail/binary>> = Binary,
  248:             case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Head) of
  249:                 ok ->
  250:                     timer:sleep(1000),
  251:                     send_chunks(Socket, Tail);
  252:                 {error,closed} ->
  253:                     ok
  254:             end;
  255:         true ->
  256:             gen_tcp:send(Socket, Binary)
  257:     end.
  258: 
  259: datadir(Config) ->
  260:     proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config).
